summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of $100,000.00 of a loan of $800,000.00 authorized at a special election in the City of Seattle, on December 29, 1908, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 19605, authorizing and directing the issuance and delivery of bonds therefor; providing for the form and details of such bonds, and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
